blogPost.excerpt: Worksphere is workplace management software for companies offering employees options to work in-office or remote. Worksphere automates desk booking, safe entry, and gives you office usage data to right-size your workplace.
blogPost.body: Worksphere is workplace management software for companies offering employees options to work in-office or remote. Worksphere automates desk booking, safe entry, and gives you office usage data to right-size your workplace.
blogPost.title: Worksphere - Software to manage your flexible workplace
blogPost.author: Lindsay Amos

localize.description: Worksphere是一款工作场所管理软件，为企业提供员工在办公室或远程工作的选择。Worksphere可以自动预约办公桌，安全输入，并为您提供办公室使用数据，以正确确定工作场所的规模。
localize.tagline: 管理灵活工作场所的软件

localize.description: Worksphere是一款工作場所管理軟件，爲企業提供員工在辦公室或遠程工作的選擇。Worksphere可以自動預約辦公桌，安全輸入，併爲您提供辦公室使用數據，以正確確定工作場所的規模。
localize.tagline: 管理靈活工作場所的軟件

previous.excerpt: A template with the goodness of both Notion 📝 and Bullet Journal 🗃️to boost your productivity. Here is what you gonna get in this template: 📜 Future Log 📙 Notes Journal 🗄️ Tasks Manager 📆 Events Manager 🎊HURRY UP, FREE FOR TODAY🎊
previous.title: Notion Bullet Journal Template - Template with goodness of both Notion + bullet journal

next.title:
Something I’m workshopping as a potential marker cycle:

Interest rates rise —> stocks sell off —> pensions/insurers/retirees buy bonds that now have higher yields —> yields fall —> stocks rise —> repeat

localize.full_text:
我正在研讨一个潜在的标记周期的东西。

利率上升-> 股票抛售-> 养老金/保险公司/退休人员购买债券，现在有更高的收益率-> 收益率下降-> 股票上涨-> 重复。

我正在研討一個潛在的標記週期的東西。

利率上升-> 股票拋售-> 養老金/保險公司/退休人員購買債券，現在有更高的收益率-> 收益率下降-> 股票上漲-> 重複。
